channel.title: Skillcape emotes?
channel.description: do sombody know how i make this, or can sombody give me a code?

item.title: Skillcape emotes?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

[quote=“Sam_Server, post:3, topic:151875”]What the hell are you talking about ~Java~ you only need to add custom animation models and then make it do the emote.
~Sam[/quote]

On another topic

i know how, dunno where the cache peice is located, however your idea of emotes is wrong. just because you add the skill cape emotes dosnt mean you will get the full effect. the emote only bends the models it does not add more mods, hence you also need “spot animations” and some still graphics before you get the “Full effect”

Read full topic

item.description:
@_Java2 wrote:

lets say you wanted it to work for a emote say yes emote find the emote and then add it so it does the emote like make a void like skillcapes(); make a void called that add the item ids and the emote you want it to do done.
